title: Spiced mocha biscuit bars
ingredients: ['100g (4 oz) butter', '200g (7 oz) caster sugar', '100g (4 oz) treacle', '1 egg', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '100ml (4 fl oz) warm coffee', '375g (13 oz) plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground cloves', '150g (5 oz) sultanas']
